summary: John Sheehan, M.D. was found to be practicing medicine in Maryland without a valid license, having allowed his Maryland license to expire in 1991 and his Colorado license in 2015. While residing in Maryland and unlicensed, he provided psychotherapy via Skype and prescribed medication to patients in Colorado. The Maryland State Board of Physicians issued a Cease and Desist Order, prohibiting him from further unauthorized medical practice.
